description:
We're back from hiatus with the best book everrrr, Devil In Winter by Lisa Kleypas. We have been introduced to our favorite hero in the whole universe, Sebastian The Lord St. Vincent! This is part one, so buckle up for a wallflower, a marriage of convenience, and a first kiss! In the rain! 
 Bonus Content: Hiatus was so restful! (not), we would die and betray each other for St. Vincent, we're horrible, hypocritical St. Vincent apologists, what happens to the horses that you rent from inns?, Jack London's lasting legacy of traumatizing high schoolers, Erin realizes the plot of Pride and Prejudice via currency conversion, RAIN KISSES!, and so much more! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Erin: Chicken Nuggets. Seriously, they're for adults, too. 
 Melody: she reread Audre Lorde's A Burst of Light and Other Essays and she was struck once again by her self care quote: "Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.” Remember that about reading romance! 
 Over Hiatus:
 Melody talked about Beach Read (and cults) on Make Out Already Pod
 Erin and Mel joined Sarah and Amanda on  Smart Podcast Trashy Books to recap Toxic Desire by Robin Lovett!
